column5: Our private rooms are conveniently located close to many attractions and major highways. We have a private pool and are 2 blocks away from Arcadia Park which offers scenic hikes, biking trails, multiple playgrounds, picnic areas, and tennis/basketball courts. Each room feature a Jack&Jill private bathroom. You will also have access to the washer/dryer, kitchen, living room, and backyard with pool if desired. The private rooms come with all the amenities you would expect from your own home.
column8: Spacious, private room in Fort Worth/Keller
